string.description: Text displayed on the screen that tells the user to check their mobile phone to proceed with the action that they are taking. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_check_your_phone_title

string.description: Text displayed on the screen that tells the user that an error occurred during the authentication process. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_auth_error_message

string.description: A text to be displayed when the user signs in and their name is known. Example: Hi, John. [CHAR_LIMIT=13]
string.name: horologist_signedin_confirmation_greeting

string.description: A text to be displayed when the user signs in and their name is not known. [CHAR_LIMIT=13]
string.name: horologist_signedin_confirmation_greeting_no_name

string.description: Title of the screen that prompts the user to sign in. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]
string.name: horologist_signin_prompt_title

string.description: Label displayed on the Chip that allows the user to sign in. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_sign_in_chip_label

string.description: Label displayed on the Chip that allows the user to use the app without being signed in. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]
string.name: horologist_guest_mode_chip_label

string.description: Label displayed on the Chip that allows the user to see the other options to sign in or to use the app without signing in. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_other_options_chip_label

string.description: Label displayed on the Chip that allows the user to start the process of creating an account. [CHAR_LIMIT=20]
string.name: horologist_create_account_chip_label

string.description: Title of the screen that displays a list of accounts and allows the user to choose one. [CHAR_LIMIT=40]
string.name: horologist_select_account_title

string.description: Text displayed on the screen that tells the user that the authentication process is in progress. [CHAR_LIMIT=NONE]
string.name: horologist_signin_placeholder_message
